h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellow Wind Sage
content: With your business concluded in Yellow Wind Ridge, you can enjoy the scene and tapestry that unfold after the battle, and then begin your journey into **Chapter 3: White Snow, Ice Cold**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellow Wind Sage'.
The content is as follows:
With your business concluded in Yellow Wind Ridge, you can enjoy the scene and tapestry that unfold after the battle, and then begin your journey into **Chapter 3: White Snow, Ice Cold**.
